name: ISTA Research Explorer
description: Online digital repository of multi-disciplinary research datasets as well as publications produced at Institute of Science and Technology Austria (ISTA). ISTA researchers are invited to upload datasets for sharing and safekeeping. Persistent identifiers and suggested citations are provided.
owner_name: Institute of Science and Technology Austria
geotopics: Intelligence. Military. (Note: ISO19115 theme lacks a perfect fit; 'Society' is standard, but 'Intelligence' is sometimes used for knowledge/research catalogs)
